mapper.insert: insert into task_info (id, task_id, status, start_time, end_time, "completion time", priority, label, description, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{completionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{label,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update task_info set task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "completion time" = #{completionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, label = #{label,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, task_id, status, start_time, end_time, "completion time", priority, label, description, create_time, update_time from task_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, task_id, status, start_time, end_time, "completion time", priority, label, description, create_time, update_time from task_info
